name: Contemporary Italian Cinema Part I
description: (Offered in English) This course is a study of Italian cinema from the late 1970s to the present. Various works from several directors (Nanni Moretti, Giuseppe Tornatore, Bernardo Bertolucci, and others) will be analyzed. Films and analyses will centre on themes, genres, etc. such as Odes and Homages to Italian Cinema, Religion, Psychoanalysis, and Introspection, and Crime and Mafia. [24L, 24T]
prerequisites: Prerequisite only applicable to students enrolled in an Italian Minor, Major or Specialist program, ITA100Y5.
